comment: Уралон баркает и вступает в бой

languages.text: "Назойливые нечестивцы. Я дарую вам Слово Истинных Богов, что вырвет из ваших сердец преданность трупу на троне!"
"Insufferable profaners. I grant you the Word of the True Gods that will rid your hearts of loyalty to the corpse emperor!"
languages.original_text: "Назойливые нечестивцы. Я дарую вам Слово Истинных Богов, что вырвет из ваших сердец преданность трупу на троне!"

traits.locale_text: "Insufferable profaners. I grant you the Word of the True Gods that will rid your hearts of loyalty to the corpse emperor!"
"Insufferable profaners. I grant you the Word of the True Gods that will rid your hearts of loyalty to the corpse emperor!"
"Insufferable profaners. I grant you the Word of the True Gods that will rid your hearts of loyalty to the corpse emperor!"
"Insufferable profaners. I grant you the Word of the True Gods that will rid your hearts of loyalty to the corpse emperor!"
"Insufferable profaners. I grant you the Word of the True Gods that will rid your hearts of loyalty to the corpse emperor!"
"Insufferable profaners. I grant you the Word of the True Gods that will rid your hearts of loyalty to the corpse emperor!"

languages.text: “我无法再容忍你们的亵渎之举！我会赐予你们真神之言，让你们不再效忠尸皇！”
languages.original_text: "Insufferable profaners. I grant you the Word of the True Gods that will rid your hearts of loyalty to the corpse emperor!"

traits.locale_text: “我无法再容忍你们的亵渎之举！我会赐予你们真神之言，让你们不再效忠尸皇！”

languages.text: « Maudits profanateurs. Je vous accorde la parole des dieux véritables, qui fera disparaître de votre cœur toute loyauté envers l'Empereur-Cadavre ! »
languages.original_text: "Insufferable profaners. I grant you the Word of the True Gods that will rid your hearts of loyalty to the corpse emperor!"

traits.locale_text: « Maudits profanateurs. Je vous accorde la parole des dieux véritables, qui fera disparaître de votre cœur toute loyauté envers l'Empereur-Cadavre ! »

languages.text: 「忌々しい冒涜者どもめ。死体の皇帝への忠誠心を消し去る真の神々の言葉を授けよう！」
languages.original_text: "Insufferable profaners. I grant you the Word of the True Gods that will rid your hearts of loyalty to the corpse emperor!"

traits.locale_text: 「忌々しい冒涜者どもめ。死体の皇帝への忠誠心を消し去る真の神々の言葉を授けよう！」

languages.text: «Profanadores insoportables. Os daré la palabra de los Dioses Verdaderos, de la lealtad al emperador cadáver!».
languages.original_text: "Insufferable profaners. I grant you the Word of the True Gods that will rid your hearts of loyalty to the corpse emperor!"

traits.locale_text: «Profanadores insoportables. Os daré la palabra de los Dioses Verdaderos, de la lealtad al emperador cadáver!».

languages.text: "Unerträgliche Lästerer. Ich gewähre Euch das Wort der Wahren Götter, das Eure Herzen von der Loyalität dem Leichenimperator gegenüber läutern wird!"
languages.original_text: "Insufferable profaners. I grant you the Word of the True Gods that will rid your hearts of loyalty to the corpse emperor!"

traits.locale_text: "Unerträgliche Lästerer. Ich gewähre Euch das Wort der Wahren Götter, das Eure Herzen von der Loyalität dem Leichenimperator gegenüber läutern wird!"

languages.text: "Katlanılmaz zındıklar sizi. Sizi ceset imparatora olan sadakatinizden kurtaracak, Gerçek Tanrıların Kelamı'nı bahşedeceğim!"
languages.original_text: "Insufferable profaners. I grant you the Word of the True Gods that will rid your hearts of loyalty to the corpse emperor!"
